file_content.text: Admiral Ivernus should be landing in the spaceport very soon. The lieutenant major will see you there.
Oh, there you are. The lieutenant major is most eager to speak with you.
Do be careful out there.
Welcome back. The lieutenant major is waiting.
Have a pleasant day.
Lieutenant Major Pirrell requested you be admitted to him immediately. The door is open.
You're smarter than the last bucket of bolts that worked here.
Good droid.
I am the last "bucket of bolts" that worked here. My repair technician was highly efficient.
I left you in pieces all over this floor, as I recall.
Didn't I blast you?
Thankfully, I have no memory of such an unpleasant incident. The repair technician wiped it before reactivating me.
Is there an endless supply of you things around here?
You must be a copy.
No, I'm quite unique. Please don't blast me again.
The lieutenant major anxiously awaits you. Good day.
A pleasure to see you again. The lieutenant major is expecting you.
Enjoy your stay in Sobrik.
Please don't keep the lieutenant major waiting.
I'm sorry, I'm terribly busy right now. If you'd like an appointment with Lieutenant Major Pirrell, please come back later.
Welcome to the office of Lieutenant Major Pirrell. I am ODX-9. How may I be of assistance?
Tell your boss he has a visitor.
I need to see Pirrell.
I'm terribly sorry, but the lieutenant major is in a meeting and cannot be disturbed.
What are you supposed to be, his butler?
You tell me.
I am a protocol droid of the series ODX. My primary function is reception and information.
Pirrell sent for me. Didn't he tell you?
I've got an appointment.
That's odd. I have no record of an appointment in my scheduling databanks.
If I may inquire, with whom do I have the pleasure of speaking?
I'm a bounty hunter. That's all you need to know.
My name isn't important.
A bounty hunter? Oh, how interesting! I don't believe I've ever met one of you.
Just announce me to the lieutenant major, already.
I'm in a hurry.
I'm here to speak with Pirrell, not answer stupid questions.
Just let me in.
My sincerest apologies, but the lieutenant major is currently in a meeting and cannot be disturbed.
Thank you for visiting Lieutenant Major Pirrell's office. Have a pleasant day.
Get the lieutenant major! Right now!
Quit jerking me around!
Oh! Yes! Yes! Right away!
What's the fine for destroying an Imperial droid?
I should blast you to bits.
The penalty for destroying Imperial property is--oh my! I'll tell the lieutenant major you're here!
I'm so sorry to bother you, Lieutenant Major--
The Republic had better be bombing the planet, you worthless piece of junk!
Sir, forgive me! I had no choice! There's someone here--
I don't care who's out there, you scrap pile! I told you I was not to be disturbed!
"Discretion is of utmost importance." Ring a bell?
Don't worry, I'll be discreet.
I hear you're looking for a professional problem-solver.
I'm a bounty hunter.
I'm answering your encoded request for help.
You asked for me.
Sir, shall I call security?
No! No, that's not necessary. Send our guest in right away.
This time, make sure we are not disturbed for any reason. Any. Reason. Understood?
Perfectly, sir! I will unlock the door right now.
Do go inside. I, ah, apologize for keeping you.
Thanks, I will. [Blast ODX-9.]
What was that racket? ODX? ODX? Answer me, you worthless piece of junk! Who's out there?
I got your encoded request, Pirrell.
You sent for me.
What encoded request? What are you....
Remember, "discretion is of utmost importance." That's what your message said, right?
You don't want to yell.
What the blazes are you....
I'm here to solve your problems. Bounty hunter.
Fix-it crew.
My problems? What do you know about my problems?
Ah, of course. I understand. Give me a moment to unlock the door.
Pirrell is our only connection to Admiral Ivernus, so let's make the lieutenant major a very satisfied customer.
Come in, and we'll discuss things in private.
I regret that Lieutenant Major Pirrell is not in at the moment. Please come back later.
You talk too much.
Terribly sorry if I've offended you. I'm afraid the lieutenant major is in a meeting and cannot be disturbed.
It will be when I talk to Pirrell, you walking junkheap.
Not at the moment.
Walking junkheap? I receive daily maintenance, I assure you.
Regardless, the lieutenant major is in a meeting and cannot be disturbed.
